claim: Every patient with pneumonia and contact with a SARS-CoV-2 positive person will be counted as a Covid case
label: Missing context

claim: A viral video on Facebook exposes the pandemic hoax depicting actors posing as COVID-19 cases.

claim: The COVID-19 vaccine is not needed because the disease is successfully treated in 99.9% of cases.
label: FALSE

claim: Coronavirus cases decreased in Bolivia because of the approval of chlorine dioxide
label: Misleading

claim: There are only more cases because Germany tests more
label: Missing context

claim: The instruction manual for a COVID-19 diagnostic test states that it can give a positive result in case the person who provided the sample had in the past contracted any coronavirus.
label: FALSE

claim: An image of two lorries transporting coffins claims to show preparations for Sri Lanka’s second wave of coronavirus cases in November 2020.
label: Misleading

claim: In Sweden 98% of reported deaths from COVID-19 were actually deaths from unrelated causes. The vast majority of the reported cases were fake and 23 doctors were sent to prison for this deception.

claim: The government introduces new measures due to the new record number of cases. The schools are to switch to distance education; the transport will stop working; malls will be closed.
label: FALSE

label: FALSE
